name: Orange Snipers
description:
A dangerous and powerful mafia group have held up in a high-rise building. You play as a commando, armed with a wire-guided missile launcher, and your mission is to take down all the gangsters by firing your missiles into the building window. If you wait for too long, you will be spotted and fail your mission!

As you climb the building you will face more powerful and faster mafia members. You only have a limited amount of ammo for each floor. 

Use the ARROW KEYS to move the scope around

Use the SPACEBAR to fire your missile

Press R to Restart the Game from Level 1
